channel.title: ArcGis on BrainExt
channel.description: Recent content in ArcGis on BrainExt

item.description: ArcGis Metrics Steps Either programatically or manually get a token to use in requests http://server[:port]/arcgis/admin/generateToken Specify the web portal in the url field Navigate to the server subsite admin page and test the token Run https://127.0.0.1/<serversite>/<webadaptor>/admin/usagereports?f=json Run a report to pull usage reports or logs Usage reports can be used to see the site hits by product Logs can be used to see specific user hits per product Users may show as anonymous Programatically pull the JSON with the token in order to evaluate Upsert the pulled data into a sql table and perform some analysis Enrich the pulled data with additional context (User info from AD, user location, etc.
